channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34117|2024-10-22T20:34:50.419Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20client%20sdk
item.description: Relative path traversal in the Zoom Client SDK before version 5.15.0 may allow an unauthorized user to enable information disclosure via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34118|2024-10-22T20:34:26.157Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20rooms%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in Zoom Rooms for Windows before version 5.14.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-34116|2024-10-22T20:41:18.163Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in the Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.15.0 may allow an unauthorized user to enable an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-06-06T15:21:25.196Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-06-04T17:46:30.360Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-08-02T00:28:00.293Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-08-02T00:27:59.863Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-09-20T14:31:59.382Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20vdi%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-09-20T14:34:14.212Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- see%20references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK’s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.
